Interface UserADT

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Seller, User

    public interface UserADT
    Interface for User Class to define function of methods
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kyle Aure and Johnny Tran

      • bid

        boolean bid(Item item,
            double bid)
        Allows this user to bid on an item. This method should me used to update the highest bid on an item by having this user bid on the specific item.
        Parameters:
        item - object of class Item to be bid on.
        bid - double value this user wants to bid.
        Returns:
        boolean True - bid was successful. False - bid was unsuccessful because it was less than the current highest bid or it was more than the buy-now price.
        Require:
        Item object must be initialized with a starting bid and be on a for-sale list.
        Ensure:
        bid > item.getHighestBid() && bid < item.getBuyNowPrice() && item.setHighestBid(bid)

      • purchase

        void purchase(Item item)
        Allows this user to purchase an item using the buy-now price. This method should be used to purchase an item at a buy-now price. The item will automatically be put in this users recently purchased list.
        Parameters:
        item - object of class Item to be purchased.
        Require:
        item object must be initialized with a buy-now price.
        Ensure:
        item is added to this users recent purchases and removed from the seller's sell-list.
